original_title: Marvin the Martian & K9: 50 Years on Earth
overview: Collection of classic cartoons including "Haredevil Hare", "Mad as a Mars Hare", "Duck Dodgers and the Return of the 24 1/2th Century", "Spacedout Bunny", "Lumber Jack Rabbit", and "Hyde and Go Tweet".
tagline: Six uncut fully animated cartoons, featuring that pint-sized alien, Marvin the Martian
title: Marvin the Martian & K9: 50 Years on Earth
